attributes.action: Stop failed asylums moving to Loftus we haven't got resources for our own
attributes.additional_details: If they move them here we would need another school and deffently some more resources doctors etc this isn't even in a main bus route for people why not move them in a town where it is easy access to shops etc x
attributes.background: Schools s are full doctors are full there isn't a main bus route please sign let's try stop this x

rejection.details:
It doesn't appear that failed asylum seekers are moving to Loftus. We are therefore not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You may be interested to read what your local MP for Loftus recently said about this issue on his website: http://tomblenkinsop.com/2017/02/01/toms-comments-on-g4s-dropping-asylum-seeker-housing-in-loftus/
